alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 24 at 5:55PM MDT until April 25 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM MONDAY TO 11 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches above 8,000 feet. Accumulations up to 18 inches across the highest elevations of the southern half of the range. Totals ranging from 5 to 8 inches along Wyoming Highway 28 from Red Canyon to South Pass. Northeast wind gusting 20 to 30 mph Tuesday. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains East. * WHEN...From 11 PM Monday to 11 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult along Wyoming Highway 28, especially on the east slope of South Pass. Expect difficult conditions in the backcountry. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The period of heaviest snowfall will be during the daylight hours Tuesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
